summary: TAKATA RECALL - THIS IS RIDICULOUS.  I CANNOT USE ALL 7 SEATS IN MY 7-PASSENGER VEHICLE AND THERE IS NO END IN SIGHT.  PARTS ARE NOT AVAILABLE AND NOBODY CAN GIVE ANY REASONABLE ESTIMATES OF WHEN THEY WILL BE AVAILABLE.  PLEASE ALLOW PEOPLE AFFECTED TO GO TO THEIR DEALERS TO HAVE THE FAULTY AIRBAGS REMOVED/DISCONNECTED UNTIL PARTS ARE AVAILABLE.  WE NEED TO BE ABLE TO USE OUR VEHICLES FULLY.
